summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3160 for the improvement of East 56th Street, from 1st Avenue Northeast to Latona Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38613, amended by Ordinance No. 39363, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
